com.gensym.jgi
Interface G2ConnectionHandlerFactory

public interface G2ConnectionHandlerFactory

This Interface defines a factory for handling incomming unsolicted (initiated from G2) connections from G2. It is used by the G2Connection class to create a G2Connection for a specific G2Connection.

See Also:
G2Connection

Method Summary
 G2Connection createG2Connection(String connection_data)
          This method must be implemented by a G2ConnectionHandlerFactory to return a G2Connection for a given unsolicated G2Connection
 

Method Detail

createG2Connection

public G2Connection createG2Connection(String connection_data)
This method must be implemented by a G2ConnectionHandlerFactory to return a G2Connection for a given unsolicated G2Connection
Parameters:
connection_data - a string sent from the G2 to identify the connection (from the GSI-INTERFACE Remote-Process-Initialization-String attribute)
